alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 25 at 4:13PM CST until February 26 at 10:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest New Mexico and far west Texas. This includes the Rio Grande Valley, and southwest deserts. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust will reduce visibilities and make travel dangerous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and wind gusts will occur over higher terrain, through passes, and over areas east of high ridges.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Western El Paso County
